projects.name: Professional Portfolio
description: Professional portfolio developed using React js and deployed via Github pages.

projects.name: Art Portfolio
description: Artist portfolio website utilizing Angular js and a Microsoft Azure function backend.
Deployed and configured project via the Microsoft Azure portal.
CI/CD via Github pipelines to Azure instance.
Utilized the Azure CDN to reduce load times for images.

projects.name: Asp.Net MVC Web Application
description: Informational website inspired by a video game utilizing ASP.NET MVC
Deployed and published website through Microsoft Azure using Visual Studio.
Dynamically built detail pages dependent on character selection on index page.
